Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) is a promising power generation technology with a wide range of fuel flexibility.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ methane reforming

Sentencas: In this paper, performance evaluation of SOFC fuelled with carbon based fuels like CH4 were carried out on La0.8Sr0.2Ga0.83Mg0.17O3-delta (LSGM) electrolyte supported single cell with symmetrical electrodes consisted of La0.4Sr0.6Co0.2Fe0.7Nb0.1O3-delta (LSCFN)-Gd0.1Ce0.9O1.95 (GDC) functional layers and LSCFN current collect layers.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ methane reforming

Sentencas: In-situ reforming of methane by carbon dioxide at the anode was successfully achieved on LSCFN based anode, which greatly enhanced the cell performance.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ methane reforming

Sentencas: The maximum power density of the single cell was dramatically increased from 280 to 455 mW/cm(2) when fuelled with 10% CO2-90% CH4 compared with pure methane at 850 degrees C with a fuel inlet rate of 50 mL/min.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ methane reforming

Sentencas: No obvious degradation was observed during the cell operation, demonstrating a stable and wide operation range with CO2-CH4 fuel on LSCFN based anode.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of solid oxide fuel cell with in-situ methane reforming
